26#pragma once
27
28#include "api/video_codecs/video_decoder.h"
29#include "VTVideoDecoderSPI.h"
30#include "WebKitUtilities.h"
31
32namespace webrtc {
33
34class WebKitDecoderReceiver final : public DecodedImageCallback {
35public:
36 explicit WebKitDecoderReceiver(VTVideoDecoderSession);
37 ~WebKitDecoderReceiver();
38
39 VTVideoDecoderFrame currentFrame() const { return m_currentFrame; }
40 void setCurrentFrame(VTVideoDecoderFrame currentFrame) { m_currentFrame = currentFrame; }
41 OSStatus decoderFailed(int error);
42
43 void initializeFromFormatDescription(CMFormatDescriptionRef);
44
45private:
46 int32_t Decoded(VideoFrame&) final;
47 int32_t Decoded(VideoFrame&, int64_t decode_time_ms) final;
48 void Decoded(VideoFrame&, absl::optional<int32_t> decode_time_ms, absl::optional<uint8_t> qp) final;
49
50 CVPixelBufferPoolRef pixelBufferPool(size_t pixelBufferWidth, size_t pixelBufferHeight, bool is10bit);
51
52 VTVideoDecoderSession m_session { nullptr };
53 VTVideoDecoderFrame m_currentFrame { nullptr };
54 size_t m_pixelBufferWidth { 0 };
55 size_t m_pixelBufferHeight { 0 };
56 bool m_is10bit { false };
57 bool m_isFullRange { false };
58 CVPixelBufferPoolRef m_pixelBufferPool { nullptr };
59};
60
61}
62
